name: OG Sweet Tarts
description:
Lets be real. We've talked about it on BLND and Beginner Blending. I'll stop being lazy.
It's Sweet Tarts. True to the name.
It's easily the most authentic profile I have ever made, down to the chalkiness. 
It's just an amazing candy vape, and is spot on Sweet Tarts.





All image rights go to http://www.instructables.com/id/Homemade-Sweet-Tarts/
author: Jerrysnaps

reviews.text: Dry powdery orange candy.  Almost like eating powdered tang or cool aid.  It has a nice tang, but too much orange up front for a sweet tart.  In a sweet tart I get the tart candy up front combined with the artificial fruit flavor.  In this I cant get away from the strong orange powder note.  Not a bad orange candy type, but would need to overcome that orange flavor to get that authentic sweet tart.  This may be my palate because orange flavorings are strong and overpowering to me.
